channel.title: Comments on: Want a Coffee Bot? New Tutorial Can Help You Make One

item.title: By: The Future is Here: How Tend.ai Co-Founder Mark Silliman Transformed His Honda into a Self-Driving Car | StartupBend
item.dc:creator: The Future is Here: How Tend.ai Co-Founder Mark Silliman Transformed His Honda into a Self-Driving Car | StartupBend
item.description: […] Mark purchased a 2017 Honda Civic in the name of research. Drawing on an open source project called comma.ai, he used software to transform the Civic into an autonomous vehicle “optimized for Oregon roads.” Side note: This is not the first time Mark has spearheaded a cool project. Check out his past work on the turtlebot. […]
item.content:encoded: […] Mark purchased a 2017 Honda Civic in the name of research. Drawing on an open source project called comma.ai, he used software to transform the Civic into an autonomous vehicle “optimized for Oregon roads.” Side note: This is not the first time Mark has spearheaded a cool project. Check out his past work on the turtlebot. […]

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: I have a question. Is there a tutorial for hacking into someone else's robot (for example, a robot located a floor above you) and reprogramming their robot bring you coffee? Because I'd like to see that tutorial. Purely academic reasons.
item.content:encoded: I have a question. Is there a tutorial for hacking into someone else’s robot (for example, a robot located a floor above you) and reprogramming their robot bring you coffee? Because I’d like to see that tutorial. Purely academic reasons.
